entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 26.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
